findings.title: Lack of mnemonic verification mechanism
findings.description: The wallet lacks a mechanism to verify the mnemonic phrase.

findings.title: Add watch address can be any string
findings.description: The business logic allows adding a watch address with any arbitrary string value.

findings.title: Unprotected Signature Request
findings.description: The window.addEventListener judges the origin of the message, allowing any site to initiate a signature request without proper authorization to connect to the wallet.
